alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Pennington Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:19PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM MDT... At 719 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Interior, or 23 miles west of Kadoka, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cedar Pass and eastern Badlands National Park around 725 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 128 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
